tldr: This article is a biography of William Hume-Rothery, a notable chemist and metallurgist. It covers his early life, education, and career, focusing on his groundbreaking work on intermetallic compounds, electron compounds, and the role of free electrons in the solid state. Hume-Rothery's research significantly contributed to the understanding of alloys and their properties, making him a prominent figure in the field of metallurgy.
